room_title: Escape room "The Candy Factory" by Escapade 360 in Chicago
room_address: 77 South Riverside Drive, Suite 300, Elgin, IL, 60120
room_description:
The Mueller factory, once the maker of Switzerland's most popular chocolates, has been struggling for several few years, and it looks like they're on their last legs. CEO Carlotta Mueller thinks that they can turn things around if the staff could just find her great-great-grandfather's old candy bar recipe and start producing it again.
Up to now, no one has been able to find it... but maybe you can. Carlotta will arrive at the factory in an hour, and if your team doesn't have that chocolate bar to show her, the factory is done! Can you find the recipe, produce the candy, and save the factory?
